channel.title: Hearts of Wulin: Emperor of Bandits Feature (New Player/GMT-friendly)
channel.description:
**Hearts of Wulin: Emperor of Bandits Feature Film (GMT-Friendly!)**
**NEW ARRIVAL OFFERING**
The self-styled Emperor of Bandits has died under mysterious circumstances, and now every unsavory character with a band of thugs and will to power is converging on your province to take control of the Leopard Throne.
**This is a New Arrival special! Please wait 48 hours to join if you have been on The Gauntlet for more than 90 days.**
This is a 2-session 'feature film', so please sign up during the first week only if you can make a good-faith effort to attend both session. If seats are still available when Open Signup comes, you may sign up for single sessions.
Session 1: [date=2019-08-20 time=15:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LkMc3WaYbtzBtISL2ON
Session 2: [date=2019-08-27 time=15:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LkMcUNl9YcZM6YqDmsu

item.title: Hearts of Wulin: Emperor of Bandits Feature (New Player/GMT-friendly)
item.dc:creator: @JimLikesGames
item.description:
@JimLikesGames wrote:

Hearts of Wulin: Emperor of Bandits Feature Film (GMT-Friendly!)

NEW ARRIVAL OFFERING

The self-styled Emperor of Bandits has died under mysterious circumstances, and now every unsavory character with a band of thugs and will to power is converging on your province to take control of the Leopard Throne.

This is a New Arrival special! Please wait 48 hours to join if you have been on The Gauntlet for more than 90 days.

This is a 2-session ‘feature film’, so please sign up during the first week only if you can make a good-faith effort to attend both session. If seats are still available when Open Signup comes, you may sign up for single sessions.

Session 1: 2019-08-20T19:00:00Z: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LkMc3WaYbtzBtISL2ON

Session 2: 2019-08-27T19:00:00Z: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LkMcUNl9YcZM6YqDmsu
